author: asianlego
title: With 50% more bricks!
review: Back then bulk bricks were sometimes packaged in the red buckets which were nice and very thoughtful of TLG. This bucket, according to the outside of the bucket, has '50% MORE BRICKS, TWICE AS MUCH FUN (compared to 4133)'. Yes, they actually used the comparison on their own product. This product apart from the normal variety of bricks, also has some of the discontinued chunky flowers  and the giant 4x2 wide headed people (this time being monsters instead of humans in 2229)
